room_title: Escape room "The Order" by I Survived The Room in New York
room_address: 4711 Van Dam St Long Island City, NY 11101
room_description:
You've been invited to join a mysterious and ancient society. Should you succeed in completing their initiation, you will gain the secrets of the Order and all their arcane knowledge. But be careful. As you progress, you may uncover some of the history of this shadowy organization. It will be up to you to determine who to trust and what to believe.
With different ways to play, the Order boasts multiple endings to your story. But the price for failure may be more than you're willing to payâ€¦
